The Green Eye

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 386
magic penetration [pen]: 2
auto spell [autocombatspell]: #990 Sleep
(unremovable [cursed], won't-be-picked-up [nofind], magiceye [magiceye])

Requires 10N to forge (N2)

This eye once belonged to a mighty druid. If the owner replaces his own eye with this one, the Green Eye will come alive and assist him by casting spells at any enemy who comes within sight. The Green Eye will also give increased magic penetration when the owner of the eye casts spells.
